objectives: Students will discuss travel and tourism using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Action/Adventure themed scenarios related to travel and tourism
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining travel and tourism content with Action/Adventure narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore travel and tourism through a Action/Adventure lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a high-stakes action sequence involving travel and tourism

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to travel and tourism in a action context
Students engage in action themed role-play about travel and tourism using neutral register
Students create original action themed content about travel and tourism in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe travel and tourism in a Action/Adventure scenario?
What chase or pursuit might be involved in travel and tourism?
Can you create a Action/Adventure story about travel and tourism?
How does travel and tourism change when viewed through a Action/Adventure perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this action scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Action/Adventure situation involving travel and tourism
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in action context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within action theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Action/Adventure theme: High energy, excitement, physical challenges

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Action/Adventure themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
